title: Development of high barrier-coated white cardboard for fruit preservation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20479-20491
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01308E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zheng Cheng, Jialin Li, Miao Su, Naiyu Xiao, Le Zhong, Xueqin Zhang, Meixian Liu, Qifeng Chen, Jinxian Zhou
High-barrier PVDC emulsion-coated white cardboard was prepared by a facile coating method, which exhibited excellent mechanical properties, good barrier effect, and preservation function, showing great potential for green packaging applications.
